law.catch_line: A person may not violate an order, rule, or regulation issued under the authority of this subtitle....

text.section: A person may not violate an order, rule, or regulation issued under the authority of this subtitle.

section.section: A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 6 months or a fine not exceeding $1,000 or both.
A person who willfully violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or a fine not exceeding $5,000 or both.
